com.netflix.genie.web.services

Interface AgentConnectionPersistenceService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JpaAgentConnectionPersistenceServiceImpl

    @Validated
public interface AgentConnectionPersistenceService
    Persistence service to store and lookup which server is a given job/agent connected to.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> lookupAgentConnectionServer(@NotBlank java.lang.String jobId)
      Lookup the hostname/address of the server with an active connection to a given agent.
      void removeAgentConnection(@NotBlank java.lang.String jobId, @NotBlank java.lang.String hostname)
      Remove an existing connection currently active from the given agent to the local node.
      void saveAgentConnection(@NotBlank java.lang.String jobId, @NotBlank java.lang.String hostname)
      Store a new connection currently active from the given agent to the given node.

    • Method Detail

      • saveAgentConnection

        void saveAgentConnection(@NotBlank
                         @NotBlank java.lang.String jobId,
                         @NotBlank
                         @NotBlank java.lang.String hostname)
        Store a new connection currently active from the given agent to the given node.
        Parameters:
        jobId - the id of a job the agent is running
        hostname - the server owning the connection

      • removeAgentConnection

        void removeAgentConnection(@NotBlank
                           @NotBlank java.lang.String jobId,
                           @NotBlank
                           @NotBlank java.lang.String hostname)
        Remove an existing connection currently active from the given agent to the local node. The entity won't be deleted if it was already modified by a different server.
        Parameters:
        jobId - the id of a job the agent is running
        hostname - the hostname expected to be associated to the connection

      • lookupAgentConnectionServer

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> lookupAgentConnectionServer(@NotBlank
                                                                 @NotBlank java.lang.String jobId)
        Lookup the hostname/address of the server with an active connection to a given agent.
        Parameters:
        jobId - the id of a job the agent is running
        Returns:
        the server hostname or empty
